info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 15 at 3:32PM EST until January 17 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze possible. Winds could gust over 40 mph. * WHERE...Northern Litchfield County. * WHEN...From Sunday evening through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down large tree branches and isolated trees. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates Sunday night into early Monday morning could reach up to 1 inch per hour at times.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
